issue.title: where is roscore running in cloudsim?

content.raw:
uh, ok, seems a little late to be learning about a new ROS architecture, but I'll start working on it.

In general, how are we supposed to start ROS nodes?  And if one dies, then restart it, without shell access?  Alternatively, how do we get shell access to the container with just a VPN connection, without using the ssh key?
